casebody.data:
PERFECTION COOLER CO. et al. v. ROTAX CO., Inc. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 24, 1922.) No. 13. Duell, Warfield & Duell, of New York City (F. P. Warfield, L. A. Watson, and LawrencQ Bristol, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Charles Neave, of New York City, and A. S. Pattison, of Washington, D. C. (Harrison F. Lyman, of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER. Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
